title.rendered: Exposure Visit at Saket City Walk

content.rendered: On 21st June 2014, students from the Kalyanam STeP centre at Madangir in Delhi, were taken to Saket Select City Walk mall for an exposure visit. The students had interaction with the managers of Reliance, Yo! China and other retail outlets through which the students were able to understand the procedure of work and were able to clarify their doubts about what exactly is needed to get a job at the retail sector. Since visiting to a mall itself was a new experience for a few students, they were all curious and at the same time exited that soon they will be working in one of the shops at the mall.
